name: Dwarf
description: Hardy and resilient race, known for their craftsmanship and battle prowess.

name: Elf
description: Graceful and intelligent beings with a deep connection to nature and magic.

name: Human
description: Versatile and adaptable, humans excel in various disciplines.

name: Kobold
description: Small, nimble reptilian creatures, often underestimated but clever and resourceful.
